post.text:
The Republican nominee for president is enthusiastically supported by the KKK's official newspaper. 

Here's what you can do about it: IWillVote.com

comment.author: Shaina
comment.text: Only after few days Americans are going to make history by electing Hillary as their next president. People already started VOTE FOR HILLARY, VOTE FOR BLUE and VOTE FOR DEMOCRACY. ALWAYS PRAY TO GOD TO SEE HILLARY AS THE NEXT HISTORIC PRESIDENT OF USA.

replies.author: Alex
replies.text: yet it was you hillary that took kkk donation money and had one of their leaders as a "beloved" mentor. But it never matters to her mannequins. She could be caught eating diaper waste and her lemmings would still follow her over the cliff. 2 major fbi investigations on her and her kool-aid drinking sheep still keep their heads in the sand.

replies.author: Brityn
replies.text: Hillary belongs in prison. The FBI will put her there soon.
